item.description:
Hey All,

As people have shown interest in playing Scrabble, as well as the Langdon Library in Newington (Short Drive from Portsmouth) wanting to get some players. The library has offered up some space for us to play.

We are hoping to make it a regular thing if people are into it.

I am also working on scheduling some time at Portsmouth too.

If you have a game or dictionary please bring it along.

Any questions let me know,

Wayne
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the front area getting ready.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Scrabble at Langdon Library
